channel.title: Help with error
channel.description:
"'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . ."
I get this a lot. Does anyone know why?
I have Java installed correctly as well.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2009, 11:52:55 pm[/size][hr]This is what I have as the client.
@echo off cd files java -Xmx256m -cp client 66 live live software members english game1 pause

item.title: Help with error
item.dc:creator: @Skw33ky Skw33ky
item.description:
@Skw33ky wrote:

“‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .”

I get this a lot. Does anyone know why?

I have Java installed correctly as well.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2009, 11:52:55 pm[/size][hr]This is what I have as the client.

@echo off
cd files
java -Xmx256m -cp client 66 live live software members english game1
pause

Read full topic
